This application was generated by Celerio, a tool developed by Jaxio, a company based in Paris, France.

Like this generated application? Have new ideas? Found a bug? Need custom support ? Would like to use Celerio within your company ? please let us know...

Here is the list of generated conversations:

You can fine tune the code generation using Celerio configuration file which can be found in the folder "appli/src/main/config/maven-celerio-plugin". This file allows you to:

  • Configure bidirectional relations (ie one to many)
  • Configure JPA inheritance
  • Rename your entities or properties
  • Configure packages to group your entities by functional domain
  • Configure number mappings or date mappings
  • etc.
